attributes.action: Increase the number of service areas on the M25 motorway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is possible to drive for a considerable length of time on the M25 and the adjacent major roads without passing a service area. We know that tiredness whilst driving can cause accidents. Therefore it is imperative that the number of service areas be increased on this very busy and often congested road.
